title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. When searching for references to a specific field, the search results are not being selected. This issue can be reproduced in Build 200201151.
OB: The search results are not automatically selected when searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the method getTempDir().
EB: The search results should be automatically selected when searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the method getTempDir().
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Make sure you have JDK 1.3.1 set as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar). 2. Open the class java.io.File. 3. Search for references to the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Observe that the search results are not automatically selected.
